Module backend.webservice.main
Package de.eatological.architecture.webservice.endpoints

Class UserSpecificEndpoints

java.lang.Object
de.eatological.architecture.webservice.endpoints.UserSpecificEndpoints
@RestController public class UserSpecificEndpoints extends Object
Endpoints which return user-specific data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UserSpecificEndpoints(de.eatological.domain.Repository repository, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper)
    Endpoints that require a token and produce user-depending results.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserSpecificEndpoints

      @Autowired public UserSpecificEndpoints(de.eatological.domain.Repository repository, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper)
      Endpoints that require a token and produce user-depending results.
      Parameters:
      repository - Autowired repository as database abstraction.

  • Method Details

    • getPlan

      @GetMapping("/plan") public JsonPlan getPlan()
      Returns the active (last accepted!) plan.
      Returns:
      JsonPlan of the logged in user

    • setCooked

      @PutMapping("/plan/cook") public JsonPlan setCooked(@RequestHeader("RecipeId") int recipeId) throws NoActivePlanException
      Alter current plan of user, authenticated by token. Set recipe with specified recipeId to cooked.
      Parameters:
      recipeId - int unique identifier for cooked recipe
      Returns:
      JsonPlan representing active Plan of user after recipe was set to cooked
      Throws:
      NoActivePlanException - in case no active plan was set for the user.

    • createPlan

      @GetMapping("/plan/create") public JsonPlan createPlan(@RequestHeader("Portions") String portionStr, @RequestHeader(value="Leftovers",defaultValue="[]") String leftOverStr, @RequestHeader(value="Preferences",defaultValue="[]") String preferenceStr) throws MalformedHeaderException
      Initiates the creation of a new recipe plan.
      Parameters:
      portionStr - List of ints with the sizes of the individual meals.
      leftOverStr - List of InJsonItem, representing the leftovers to use in the new plan
      preferenceStr - List of InJsonItem, preferably used in the new plan
      Returns:
      JsonPlan of the logged in user
      Throws:
      MalformedHeaderException - in case some json parsing went wrong

    • acceptPlan

      @PostMapping("/plan/accept") public JsonPlan acceptPlan()
      Accepts the current plan, closing the user session.
      Returns:
      JsonPlan of the logged in user

    • swipeLeft

      @PutMapping("/plan/swipeleft") public JsonPlan swipeLeft(@RequestHeader("Slot") int slot)
      Replaces the given slot with the previous recipe.
      Parameters:
      slot - int, the slot number to be replaced
      Returns:
      JsonPlan of the logged in user

    • swipeRight

      @PutMapping("/plan/swiperight") public JsonPlan swipeRight(@RequestHeader("Slot") int slot)
      Replaces the given slot with a new recipe.
      Parameters:
      slot - int, the slot number to be replaced
      Returns:
      JsonPlan of the logged in user

    • getGroceries

      @GetMapping("/groceries") public JsonGroceryList getGroceries()
      Returns the current groceries for authenticated user.
      Returns:
      JsonGroceryList representing all groceries of the logged-in user

    • buyGroceries

      @PutMapping("/groceries/buy") public JsonGroceryList buyGroceries(@RequestHeader("Groceries") String groceriesStr) throws MalformedHeaderException
      Sets the bought amount to the required amount of specified ingredient on grocery list. Returns the new groceryList.
      Returns:
      JsonGroceryList representing all groceries of the logged-in user
      Throws:
      MalformedHeaderException - in case some json parsing went wrong

    • renameUser

      @PutMapping("/user/rename") public JsonResult renameUser(@RequestHeader("Username") String username) throws UserException
      Renames a user using a token for an active session.
      Parameters:
      username - String new username for user that is authenticated by token
      Returns:
      JsonResult in case renaming was successful
      Throws:
      UserException - iff the username could not be updated

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("/user/delete") public JsonResult deleteUser() throws TokenException
      Remove user with his plan, history, restrictions and active tokens.
      Returns:
      JsonResult in case the deletion was successful
      Throws:
      TokenException - iff no user could be found for the token

    • setRestrictions

      @PostMapping("/restrictions/set") public JsonResult setRestrictions(@RequestHeader("Restriction") String restriction) throws RestrictionException
      Set a diet for an authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      restriction - restriction that should be selected
      Returns:
      JsonResult iff setting the given restriction was successful
      Throws:
      RestrictionException - iff the restriction could bot be set
